title: Is it legal to burn yourself? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Suicide is actually illegal. So attempted suicide by self incineration would be illegal also. However if suicide is illegal and you succeed is the government going to prosecute a dead man for the crime? Interestingly, suicide by jumping in front of a train is supposedly common in Japan (in the absence of guns which is a favorite method of suicide in the US) ... so much so that the government enacted a law that the family of a person who commits suicide is responsible for the cost of cleaning up the mess.
